attributes.additional_details:
food ethics labelling

As a consumer I would like a push towards comprehensive labelling of all food products in relation to ethics, as we see with white goods and environmentaly friendly ratings. Issues such as third world ethics, Gm crops,  environmental protection and farming methods are of great importance and easy access to this imformation would encourage the implementation of social change in these matters.

rejection.details: This petition has been closed at the petitioners request
